>
[Blackaxe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=490)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 313</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This potent weapon used by [Treerazer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=394) is a _+4 [greater corrosive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292) [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) obsidian [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)_ that grants a +4 item bonus to attack rolls, deals an extra 2d6 damage to plants, and has the properties of [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374).

<document level="2" id="action-294" />

<document level="2" id="action-710" />

<document level="2" id="action-711" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
